About Me


Hi I am Jingyi Xie , a first-year ECE master student at Duke University.

I once interned at the Corporate Technology of SIEMENS as a Research and Development Intern.

With a specialized track in software engineer , I have deep computer science understanding in data structure and algorithm, as well as experience in C++ and Java OO design, system programming (concurrency, synchronization, TCP socket) and web-app development.

I have good time management and communication skills and I am to work in a deeply collaborative environment.
